panel.name: object properties
panel.title: Object Profile
panel.panel.string: You can't modify this object across a region boundary
You can't modify these objects across a region boundary

line_editor.name: Object Name
line_editor.tool_tip: The name is limited to 63 characters. Longer prim names are cut short. Names can only consist of printable characters found in the ASCII-7 (non-extended) character set, with the exception of the vertical bar/pipe '|'.

line_editor.name: Object Description
line_editor.tool_tip: When people have 'Hover Tips on All Objects' selected in the viewer's settings, they'll see the object description pop-up for any object under their mouse pointer. The prim description is limited to 127 bytes any string longer then that will be truncated.

button.name: button set group
button.tool_tip: Choose a group to share this object's permissions

button.label: Deed
button.name: button deed
button.tool_tip: Deeding gives this item away with next owner permissions. Group shared objects can be deeded by a group officer.

combo_box.name: clickaction
combo_box.tool_tip: A click action enables you to interact with an object with a single left click. Each click action has a special cursor indicating what it does. Some click actions have requirements to function. For example Touch and Pay require scripts

check_box.label: Copy
check_box.name: checkbox allow everyone copy
check_box.tool_tip: Anyone can take a copy of the object. Object and all of its contents must be copy and transfer permissive.

check_box.label: Share
check_box.name: checkbox share with group
check_box.tool_tip: Allow all members of the set group to share your modify permissions for this object. You must Deed to enable role restrictions.

check_box.label: Modify
check_box.name: checkbox next owner can modify
check_box.tool_tip: Next owner can edit properties like item name or scale of this object.

check_box.label: Copy
check_box.name: checkbox next owner can copy
check_box.tool_tip: Next owner can make unlimited copies of this object. Copies maintain creator information, and can never be more permissive than the item being copied.

check_box.label: Transfer
check_box.name: checkbox next owner can transfer
check_box.tool_tip: Next owner can give away or resell this object

check_box.label: For Sale
check_box.name: checkbox for sale
check_box.tool_tip: Lets people buy this object, its content or it copy inworld for specified price.

combo_box.name: sale type
combo_box.tool_tip: Select whether purchaser will receive a copy, copy of the content or item itself.

check_box.label: Show in search
check_box.name: search_check
check_box.tool_tip: Let people see this object in search results

button.label: Open
button.name: open_btn
button.tool_tip: Open to view the Object Contents.

button.label: Pay
button.name: pay_btn
button.tool_tip: Open Pay Window. Object must have pay script for this to work.

button.label: Buy
button.name: buy_btn
button.tool_tip: Open Buy Window. Requires the object to be set for sale.
